urlLink Vancouver Board of Trade - Events Calendar urlLink Vancouver Board of Trade - Seminars and Workshops BCjobs.ca is proud to announce that they are working with The Vancouver Board of Trade to bring job seekers even more quality employment opportunities in British Columbia. The Vancouver Board of Trade is working in the enlightened interest of their members to promote, enhance and facilitate the development of the region as a Pacific centre for trade, commerce and travel. The Board strives to enable and empower its members to succeed, grow and prosper in the global economy.

urlLink The Canadian Art Gallery Canadian-Artist.com's mission is to make it both easy and affordable for Canadian visual artists to display their work on the Internet. They will display your artwork online for as little as $10 per month.

Alien X-ING News- 1st Edition- SPIRIT Always help others that cannot help themselves. Help someone if they ask you, CARE and do it because it makes you feel good. Feed spirit with all the good things you can do. It will come back to you. It is in your Karma. If you feed your spirit your eyes will open up and you will see more. You will have more opportunity, more money, more friends, more contacts, more of everything that is good. This will also help with creating a positive energy shift in the planet. The planet is alive and it is powered by you. What we do will make the difference in what happens in the world, by simply changing your attitude and making a commitment to improve your own life and surroundings. urlLink Yahoo! Groups: canadiancreativeproart. This is a Shared Group for Canadian Artists. If you are a talented visual artist and want to publish your work, Kathouz is a publisher for promotional products to help your art business grow. "The only prerequisite to joining this group is that you have the desire to share your work with other's and enjoy being in a shared community of other visual artists and of course, you are Canadian. This group belongs to Kathouz-IBB and is open to anyone who is a resident of Canada."
